channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Studying The Greatest Speeches In American History Can Change You (And Your Children) Forever
item.description: We simply started with the words. For the foundation of all learning, all communication, and all thought, is words.

item.title: Never Stop Loving America
item.description: It’s a mess, but a blessed one.

item.title: Is Nikole Hannah-Jones’s 1619 Project Grift Drying Up?
item.description: The gigs that funded Hannah-Jones' lavish lifestyle seem to be fewer in number and flatlining as Americans see through the Critical Race Theory scam.

item.title: A Brief Guide To Using ‘Recissions’ And ‘Pocket Recissions’ To Cut Federal Spending
item.description: The Trump rescissions package should provide an opportunity to begin to reduce the continued, disastrous growth of the federal budget.

item.title: Predatory Pricing Is More Myth Than Market Threat
item.description: Basic economic ideas explain why most alleged cases of predatory pricing represent something else entirely.

item.title: To Execute The Trump Agenda, DOJ’s Civil Rights Division Cannot Be Stuck Understaffed
item.description: The 'fork in the road for the conservative movement,' at least among lawyers, instead of chasing a paycheck, they would need to come in droves to civi...

item.title: America Loses If Russia Wins
item.description: If America relinquishes its leadership of the free world, our economy, our security, and our future will be in peril.

item.title: In Attempt To Insult Top Women’s Sports Defender, Simone Biles Confirms Difference In The Sexes
item.description: Biles’ public ‘female-only sport for me but not for thee’ approach to the issue is not only hypocritical, but incredibly unpopular.

item.title: How Republicans Can Make the Tax Bill More Pro-Growth
item.description: They should insist on making full expensing for capital investment permanent for all businesses.

item.title: ABC correspondent suspended after bashing Trump, Miller as 'world-class' haters
item.description: ABC News correspondent Terry Moran has been suspended after attacking top Trump aide Stephen Miller as "richly endowed with the capacity for hatred."

item.title: Judge allows Trump's firings at Corporation for Public Broadcasting
item.description: A federal judge on Sunday shot down a demand for reinstatement by three members of the Corporation for Public Broadcasting whom President Trump fired ...

item.title: Democrats' deportation martyr back in U.S. to face charges in migrant smuggling
item.description: Top Trump officials had been warning for weeks that Kilmar Abrego Garcia, the Salvadoran illegal migrant that Democrats turned into a deportation mart...

item.title: Mike Johnson downplays Musk's influence and says Republicans will pass Trump's tax and budget bill
item.description: With an uncharacteristic feistiness, Speaker Mike Johnson took clear sides Sunday in President Donald Trump's breakup with mega-billionaire Elon Musk.

item.title: After tear gas and street fires, a Los Angeles community cleans up as National Guard troops arrive
item.description: Ernest Melendrez woke up early Sunday to shovel tear gas pellets and other charred and broken detritus from his neighborhood's streets, the remnants o...

item.title: Pete Buttigieg Doesn’t Have a Time Machine
item.description: It means little that he can half-heartedly break from aspects of the Democratic Party’s record that he now realizes are controversial.
